channel.title: Question about jagex-like clients and refactoring
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm quite new to the rs2 section. I'm attempting to find to find a 'Jagex-like' client + server for pre-hd that includes construction. I've also noticed that most clients have only been de'obed but not refactored. Is this common or are their clients available that have been refactored?
Thanks!

item.title: Question about jagex-like clients and refactoring
item.dc:creator: @1nfus10nd 1nfus10nd
item.description:
@1nfus10nd wrote:

Awesome, Thanks for the help!

Read full topic
item.source: Question about jagex-like clients and refactoring

item.title: Question about jagex-like clients and refactoring
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

in the rs2 client more content is handled server sided than in the client itself. the only modifications in the client that would be necessary in the client would be that of reading data in a byte stream for checks (however they can easily be forced with hardcoding)

Read full topic
item.source: Question about jagex-like clients and refactoring

item.title: Question about jagex-like clients and refactoring
item.dc:creator: @1nfus10nd 1nfus10nd
item.description:
@1nfus10nd wrote:

Wouldn’t a non-refactored client severely limit your ability to fix problems and add content? For example like adding quests and fixing cooking recipes? I used to do rsclassic work and most of that was client sided from what I remember.

Read full topic
item.source: Question about jagex-like clients and refactoring

item.title: Question about jagex-like clients and refactoring
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

there are refactoring programs out there that can get the job done, not sure on the credibility of the results however.

most clients are just deobbed and slightly modified to disable rsa and connect to the local servers. not much client modification is needed after that, so that’s why they don’t bother to refactor.

Read full topic
item.source: Question about jagex-like clients and refactoring
